org.apache.drill.yarn.scripts

Class ScriptUtils.ScriptRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.yarn.scripts.ScriptUtils.ScriptRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScriptUtils.DrillbitRun
    Enclosing class:
    ScriptUtils

    public static class ScriptUtils.ScriptRunner
extends Object
    The "business end" of the tests: runs drillbit.sh and captures results.
